underlying_goal: Fix version information display when installing via `go install` by using runtime/debug.ReadBuildInfo() as a fallback, then iteratively refine the version display format
friction_detail: Claude tried to commit prematurely (user said 'commit at the end'), and the initial version display still showed 'unknown, none' for go install, requiring a follow-up refinement.
brief_summary: User wanted to fix version info for `go install` binaries using ReadBuildInfo fallback and iteratively refined the display format across multiple PRs; work was mostly achieved with a final format change still in planning.
